E‌RROR:

```
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/mesh"
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/urdf"
```

It shouldn't look recursively into the subdirectories. Could you double check the value of `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`\(I wonder if we're pointing to the `mesh` or `urdf` directories somehow\). I'm sure this is not the behavior in Gazebo.
